sub-events.comment: Destroy objects to reset layout; Play music; Create object (yet to be defined); Start timer; Save the player name; Reset multiplier to 1 (0 multiplier makes no sense)

event-group.description: Draws the polygon based on variable "Vertices" (inactive on start so vertices can load first)
event-group.title: Draw2

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Welcome to the Tutorial!" & newline & newline & "Here you will learn the basic mechanics of the game."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "The Story:" & newline & newline & "Planet sponge is getting dry! We need your help to hydrate it and save its citizens!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "The Story:" & newline & newline & "Planet sponge is getting dry! We need your help to hydrate it and save its citizens!" & newline & newline & "To do so, you have to capture the bubbles that come out of the planet's core, such as this one..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Collecting Bubbles:" & newline & newline & "You can collect a bubble as soon as it enters the collection shape (flashing)" & newline & newline & "Watch what happens..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Collecting Bubbles:" & newline & newline & "Collect a minimum of 5 bubbles using the 'X' button on your controller" & newline & newline & newline & "Notice how the bigger the bubbles are, the more water you get and the more the planet grows!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Well done!" & newline & newline & newline & "You can rotate to reach bubbles escaping towards other vertices:" & newline & newline & "Use the D-Pad on the left of your controller to rotate clockwise or counter-clockwise and collect the escaping bubbles with 'X'"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Oh no, the planet is losing it's water!" & newline & newline & newline & "You must keep collecting bubbles to ensure the planet does not disappear" & newline & newline & "If the planet disappears you will lose one life and will have to restart the same level" & newline & newline & "Watch what happens when you don't collect water"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Oh no, the planet is losing it's water!" & newline & newline & newline & "Let's try and collect enough bubbles to keep the planet from disappearing!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Oh no, the planet is losing it's water!" & newline & newline & newline & "Let's try and collect enough bubbles to keep the planet from disappearing!" & newline & newline & newline & "It's not that easy to prevent the planet from drying out!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Fortunately, there is a way to double your water." & newline & newline & "Try pressing the 'O' (circle) over a bubble to save it in a bank that doubles your amount of water" & newline & newline & "The translucent area behind the sponge illustrates the amount of accumulated water in your bank."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Banking comes with a price! If you miss one of the bubbles, you lose all the water you accumulated in your bank!" & newline & newline & "Watch what happens if you missed one bubble"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "To secure the water in your bank you have to collect one bubble (using 'X')" & newline & newline & "Try banking some bubbles using 'O' and then securing them using the 'X' button" & newline & newline & "You will be successfull if the bank's translucent area becomes opaque."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "The planet is shrinking again!" & newline & newline & "Try using banking and collecting to keep the planet alive"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "The planet is shrinking again!" & newline & newline & "Try using banking and collecting to keep the planet alive" & newline & newline & "Notice how, because banking doubles the value of water in each bubble, it's much easier to survive by banking and collecting then by just collecting"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Note that a full bank still does not prevent the planet from drying out. You must secure a bubble to secure your water and increase the size of the planet!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Remember: the goal of the game is to ensure planet sponge stays alive. While playing, you should focus on getting as much water as possible (i.e. get the highest possible score)." & newline & newline & "When you are ready, try to prevent planet sponge from disappearing for one minute using Banking ('O') and Collecting ('X')"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Try to prevent planet sponge from disappearing for one minute using Banking ('O') and Collecting ('X')"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "You are almost ready to start the real adventure!" & newline & newline & "To sum up:" & newline & "Use the D-Pad (arrow keys) to rotate the slider" & newline & "Use 'X' to Collect water bubbles immediately and 'O' to bank them for twice their value but with the risk of losing this water"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Before each adventure we will ask you to follow our guidelines in a simple task" & newline & newline & "When calibration begins you will see an arrow such as this one. Your nose should be pointing to this arrow for as long as it remains on the screen."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "While keeping your head fixed on the cross, you should track green targets (like this one) using only your eyes" & newline & "The green targets will only appear inside the white circles"& newline & newline & "If you have any questions about the calibration or the game please ask them now to the experimenters"

sub-events.comment: Timer serves as a means of preventing desync between the wheel and the fixed angle (prevents movement until the wheel has reached the next significant angle
